note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: unlint.github.com
body:
### Welcome to unlint.github.com
This automatic linter is the easiest way to validate code style in any pull request on github.

We support for now:
* C++ via [cpplint.py](http://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/cpplint/cpplint.py)
* Java via [checkstyle](http://checkstyle.sourceforge.net/)
* Scala via [scalastyle](https://github.com/scalastyle/scalastyle)
* JavaScript via [jslint](http://www.jslint.com/)
* Coffeescript via [coffeelint](http://www.coffeelint.org/)

### Usage
Simply paste url of pull request in form below and press `Advice` button to see you results.
